div.head: 四肢微厥
div.div: slight recession in the four limbs

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: slight recession in the four limbs

sense.def: Illness Sign of a slight cold in the upper and lower extremities. BYCY 19: 竊謂前症若熱 毒方出，忽被風寒閉塞，肌竅血脈不行，身體作痛，或四肢微厥 , “I venture to say that when in the case of the above-mentioned conditions heat poison is emitted, and in this situation [the body] is suddenly closed by wind cold so that the sinews, the orifices and the blood vessels can no longer operate, the entire body aches, and in some cases there is slight recession in the four limbs ”. Si zhi zhong 四肢重 , the four limbs feel heavy [1]

Alternative Names si zhi zhong ruo 四肢重弱. Illness Sign of a feeling of unbearable heaviness in the four extremities, and a sensation of fatigue when one starts moving. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry da zao 大棗：身中不足，大驚，四肢 重 , “An inadequacy [of qi] in the body. Massive fright. The four limbs feel heavy ”.
